description: An aromatic and creamy korma dish where the spices compliments the sweetness of the lamb perfectly.
name: Creamy Lamb Korma Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium green capsicum, de-seeded and sliced
1 medium yellow capsicum, de-seeded and sliced
2 medium white onions, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pot to a medium heat with the oil and lamb and fry for 3 minutes while mixing. Add the rest of the herbs and spices and fry together for 1 more minute while mixing well.

Add the peppers, onion, ginger, garlic and fry for a further 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and coconut milk, lower to heat to low, cover and allow to simmer and reduce for 60 minutes stirring occasionally.
Remove from the heat and serve with a choice of condiments.
